experience.title: Machine Learning Research Assistant
info: Designed a machine learning pipeline to train 5 million hotel room images on GPU, enabling seamless experimentation and analysis of results for improving prediction of sex traﬀicking
Developed a proof of concept to eﬀiciently produce a single embedding vector to classify hotel room images based on multiple properties without compromising the F1-score and accuracy

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern/Analyst
info: Developed a full-stack web application to search, view, edit and delete 17000+ XML reports and increased team performance by saving more than 5 minutes per hour
Implemented Depth First Search (DFS) tree algorithm to convert SQL result set to XML in linear time and show reports in a readable and clear format

experience.title: Software Engineer/Associate - Microservices
info: Enabled seamless real-time single sign-on experience for 1 million+ E-Trade and Morgan Stanley clients by developing reactive microservices to sync backend databases using Kafka

Leading development of a one-stop dashboard to keep track of server and downstream health for microservices owned by Party and Data Services Team for seamless deployment monitoring and failure detection
Saved engineers across Morgan Stanley Wealth Management backend systems 5+ hours of manual comparison every bi-monthly release for 10+ microservices by automating configuration management
Developed a proof of concept for distributed log tracing tool to visualize workflows for Morgan Stanley Online platform and enable eﬀicient error detection
